metadata.name: LES RACINES DU CIEL1
metadata.description:
This series of 6 artworks is the materialization that images can be visual poetry. For me NFTs are important because they allow to unite different forms of art that before could not be combined: poetic creation, creation of images, musical creation, creation of videos, etc.

Each artwork that has been used as basis for creating this NFT is available in large format on request.
